Property.name: isCustomPhysics
Property.HelpText: Improve Tails physics so he can move faster. Disable this option if you crash on startup.

Property.name: isCustomAnim
Property.HelpText: Add custom animations (Spin Attack, victory pose...) Disable this if you experiment crash.

Property.name: isMechRemoved
Property.HelpText: When enabled, Tails mechless will spawn during Tails Mech stages. (Some exceptions will apply, such as Bosses.)

Property.name: isJumpBall
Property.HelpText: Bring back Tails's jump ball from SA1!

Property.name: isMilesAdventure
Property.HelpText: [Experimental] Turn this on to ALWAYS play Tails. Somethin' buggin' you? (Some exceptions will apply.)

Property.name: isInfiniteFly
Property.HelpText: Miles will not get tired when flying.

Property.name: tornadoConfig
Property.HelpText: Press UP with the d-pad to call the Tornado in real time. Do it again to swap to its mech version.

Property.name: LightDashBtn
Property.HelpText: Set the button for Light Dash.

Property.name: tornadoMusic
Property.HelpText: Bring some hype when you call or transform the Tornado!

Property.name: sfxVol
Property.HelpText: Set the volume of the custom sounds effects. (max 100)

Property.name: voiceVol
Property.HelpText: Set the volume of the custom voices. (max 100)
